import React from 'react' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return (
Eats&Treats
Gallery Blog Shop Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( SignIn )}
) } export default Header
